author: wsjcom
title: Five Best: Todd S. Purdum
text:
Finishing the Hat: Collected Lyrics (1954-1981) By Stephen Sondheim (2010)
1. The reigning master of the theater song reflects on the ingredients of his art and offers provocative critiques of his canonical colleagues. He is surprisingly tough on icons, from Ira Gershwin to Lorenz Hart and Noël Coward, but reserves special scorn for Alan Jay Lerner. “It’s hard to comment on or even write about Alan Jay Lerner because his work is so professional and uninteresting when compared to that of the other major theater lyricists,”...
